actions.name: Bolt of Law
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) radiant + 4 (1d8) thunder.

actions.name: Stitch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The haladron repairs a single break or tear in an object it touches leaving no trace of the former damage. If the haladron uses this feature on a creature the creature regains 3 (1d6) hp.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The haladron doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep
